content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 7, Stoke City 2.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 7, Stoke City 2.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Kurt Zouma.
Offside, Stoke City. Geoff Cameron tries a through ball, but Mame Biram Diouf is caught offside.
Ibrahim Afellay (Stoke City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ibrahim Afellay (Stoke City).
Attempt blocked. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Kyle Walker (Manchester City) because of an injury.
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leroy Sané (Manchester City).
Foul by Fabian Delph (Manchester City).
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Manchester City 7, Stoke City 2. Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Yaya Touré.
Substitution, Manchester City. Yaya Touré replaces Fernandinho.
Attempt missed. Geoff Cameron (Stoke City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Xherdan Shaqiri.
Substitution, Manchester City. Ilkay Gündogan replaces Kevin De Bruyne.
Attempt missed. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Erik Pieters (Stoke City).
Substitution, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva replaces Gabriel Jesus.
Goal!  Manchester City 6, Stoke City 2. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a through ball.
Goal!  Manchester City 5, Stoke City 2. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Fabian Delph following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Kurt Zouma.
Foul by Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City).
Fabian Delph (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Manchester City 4, Stoke City 2. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne following a fast break.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Stoke City. Ramadan Sobhi replaces Thomas Edwards because of an injury.
Delay in match Thomas Edwards (Stoke City) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Fernandinho (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Darren Fletcher (Stoke City).
Attempt saved. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nicolás Otamendi.
Own Goal by Kyle Walker, Manchester City.  Manchester City 3, Stoke City 2.
Attempt missed. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Thomas Edwards with a cross.
Substitution, Stoke City. Ibrahim Afellay replaces Jesé.
Substitution, Stoke City. Bruno Martins Indi replaces Kevin Wimmer.
Second Half begins Manchester City 3, Stoke City 1.
First Half ends, Manchester City 3, Stoke City 1.
